rows.label: tlk45350251_03_msg0001
rows.name:
Oh, you won't believe what happened.
The budget for our agricultural
research was reduced...again!

rows.label: tlk45350251_03_msg0002
rows.name:
After the incident in Temperantia,
it looks like many nations are giving
more priority to military development.

rows.label: tlk45350251_03_msg0003
rows.name:
Invidia is a given, but the surrounding
nations are following suit as well.

rows.label: tlk45350251_03_msg0004
rows.name:
And of course, Superbia can't
afford to fall behind!

rows.label: tlk45350251_03_msg0005
rows.name:
If we don't redouble our own military
efforts, the other countries could
become a very real threat.

rows.label: tlk45350251_03_msg0006
rows.name:
But of course, what that means for us
is our research funding gets diverted to
military research instead.

rows.label: tlk45350251_03_msg0007
rows.name:
I know it's an emergency, but that
doesn't make it any less frustrating.
